hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
whoami pwd
echo "Goging to trigger Smoke test run on project of TCNG_Software" JENKINS_URL="http://10.1.3.178:8080" TOKEN_NAME=TCNG_BUILD
#To get crumb CRUMB_CMD="wget -q --auth-no-challenge --user tcng --password Pa\$\$word1 --output-document -" CRUMB_URL='http://10.1.3.178:8080/crumbIssuer/api/xml?xpath=concat(//crumbRequestField,":",//crumb)' CRUMB=`$CRUMB_CMD $CRUMB_URL`
#Post with the crubm #curl -X POST -u tcng:Pa\$\$word1 http://10.1.3.178:8080/job/TCNG_Software_Smoke_Private/buildWithParameters?token=TCNG_BUILD -H $CRUMB \ #--data-urlencode json='{"parameter": [{"name":"TCNG_IMAGE", "file":"image0"}, {"name":"TCNG_TESTSUITE", "value":"testsuite_comp_smoke"}]}' curl -X POST -u tcng:Pa\$\$word1 http://10.1.3.178:8080/job/TCNG_Software/build?token=TCNG_BUILD -H $CRUMB \ --data-urlencode json='{"parameter": [{"name":"TCNG_IMAGE", "file":"image0"}, {"name":"TCNG_TESTSUITE", "value":"testsuite_comp_smoke"}]}'
